review: Dr Smrithi did a re root canal surgery to me.I was suffering with failed root canal for the past one year as the previous doctors were not able to find the exact cause of the problem.Smrithi rescued me by performing a proper examination via multiple scans and found out the root issue.She gave multiple sittings and removed all the decay properly until it vanished to zero.it has been two months now and I have not faced any issue in that teeth and I'm using the teeth to chew and enjoy my food .I would definitely recommend smrithi for her patience * *** ********* *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The doctor listened to my dental issue. She  examined and then suggested treatment to fix tooth decay.  The treatment has started and hope to get fully well
I had an impacted tooth extraction by a surgeon from the same hospital (Glow Dental) and got pre-surgical and post-surgical assistance from Dr, Smriti.  She handled it in a good way.
Good explain about the issues clear and crystal.Minimal waiting time and utilising the latest technology equipment.
Excellent., cordial, ************** prompt analysis of problem and offering instant remedy with complete professionalism.
